description: ORDER regarding the Protocol for Production of Electronically-Stored Information (ESI) and Hard-Copy Documents. On May 24, 2024, the parties filed an Entry of Stipulated Protective Order as part of their  36  Joint Motion, which the Court GRANTED< /b> in the Order at Doc. 38. The parties indicate that they now require a production protocol because the case has progressed past the early mediation stage, and parties would benefit from a memorialized agreement requiring uniformity in the search,  processing, and production of ESI and hard-copy documents. Accordingly, the Court finds there is good cause to amend the scheduling order under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 16. The Court ADOPTS the attached Joint Protocol for Production.  Signed by Judge David W. Dugan on 6/25/2024. (orw)
